thread.title: Fans Trolls India after Humiliating Defeat
thread.title_full: Fans Trolls India after Humiliating Defeat

title: Fans Trolls India after Humiliating Defeat
text: 14:08 Posted by Asfia Afzal 41 South Africa crushed India by 214 runs in the fifth and final one day international at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai to clinch their first ODI series on Indian soil. South Africa displayed an incredible form against India with Faf du Plessis and AB De Villiers hitting sixes so far that they get enough time to be treated by the physio as the ball was retrieved. Right from the start Proteas were in brilliant control of game with their three batsmen scoring big hundreds. After an humiliating defeat against South Africa on their home ground, social networking sites was flooded with memes, trolls and sarcasm on Indian national team. Here are few funniest of all: Copyright Business Recorder, 2015
